author: Xerbutri
title: LuZaC College
intro: Discovered by coincidence and visited in November 2006. In the Netherlands they've got a nice tradition of demolishing buildings the moment that they become useless. Same story for this building. We paid a short visit.
history: It is a private secondary education in the Netherlands. The first school of this company opened in 1983. The school has moved to another location in the same city. In 2007 the building was completely demolished.
